title: The Alex Cooper Hulu doc Call Her Alex drops effusive trailer
description: The trailer for the Hulu docuseries about "Call Her Daddy: host Alex Cooper really leans into celebrating the podcast host.
text: Get excited, Daddy Gang.  By  Tim Marcin Tim Marcin Associate Editor, Culture Tim Marcin is an Associate Editor on the culture team at Mashable, where he mostly digs into the weird parts of the internet. You'll also see some coverage of memes, tech, sports, trends, and the occasional hot take. You can find him on Bluesky (sometimes), Instagram (infrequently), or eating Buffalo wings (as often as possible). Read Full Bio  on June 3, 2025 Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Flipboard All products featured here are independently selected by our editors and writers. If you buy something through links on our site, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission. Hulu dropped a trailer for Call Her Alex, a docuseries centered on Alex Cooper, the wildly popular host of the podcast Call Her Daddy. And the Daddy Gang — as her fans are known — is likely to love this two-part docuseries. The trailer features behind-the-scenes moments with Cooper, intimate childhood footage, and interviews with family. There's even a moment with Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy, whose company initially helped Call Her Daddy become a major brand. The trailer seems to set up a hagiographic doc celebrating Cooper's impressive rise to global stardom, with only a passing reference to her highly publicized and controversial split with former co-host Sofia Franklyn. It'll be interesting to see what, if anything, we learn about Call Her Daddy's history. All episodes of Call Her Alex will be released on June 10 on Hulu. Associate Editor, Culture Tim Marcin is an Associate Editor on the culture team at Mashable, where he mostly digs into the weird parts of the internet. You'll also see some coverage of memes, tech, sports, trends, and the occasional hot take. Hulu dropped a trailer for Call Her Alex, a docuseries centered on Alex Cooper, the wildly popular host of the podcast Call Her Daddy.

And the Daddy Gang — as her fans are known — is likely to love this two-part docuseries. The trailer features behind-the-scenes moments with Cooper, intimate childhood footage, and interviews with family. There's even a moment with Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy, whose company initially helped Call Her Daddy become a major brand.

The trailer seems to set up a hagiographic doc celebrating Cooper's impressive rise to global stardom, with only a passing reference to her highly publicized and controversial split with former co-host Sofia Franklyn. It'll be interesting to see what, if anything, we learn about Call Her Daddy's history.

All episodes of Call Her Alex will be released on June 10 on Hulu.
